**Security Guard Services Tender Announcement**
### Important Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01010926
* **Solicitation Number:** 22-040-RFP
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-21
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-18T15:00:00 (GMT)

### Background

The Canadian Museum of Nature is seeking a qualified security guard services provider to safeguard its premises. The successful contractor will be responsible for ensuring the museum's security and compliance with all relevant laws and regulations.

### Details

* **Duration:** The contract will commence on 2023-01-16 and end on 2028-03-31.
* **Security Guard Services:** The contractor will provide comprehensive security guard services, including:
	+ Site security and access control
	+ Response to alarms and emergencies
	+ Security measures to prevent loss or damage
	+ Assistance to visitors, employees, and contractors

### Submission Process

* **Electronic Bidding:** All bids must be submitted electronically via the Bonfire website (<https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca/opportunities/58757>). 
* **Registration:** Bidders must first register on the Bonfire website and create an online profile.

### Important Notes

* Only bids received on time will be considered.
* No hard copies of the bid will be accepted.
* Documents obtained from sources other than the Bonfire website may not be recognized during the bid and award process.

### Contact

For technical help, please call 1-800-354-8010, ext. 2 or visit <https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca/portal/support>.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 

### Respondent Information

All responses should be directed to:
**Institute Name - Canadian Museum
